section.title: More than one IP (not really necessary)

ul.li:
Add IP:
ifconfig eth0:0 194.191.122.217 broadcast 194.191.122.223 netmask 255.255.255.240 up

Add another IP:
ifconfig eth0:1 194.191.122.219 broadcast 194.191.122.223 netmask 255.255.255.240 up

Remove IP:
ifconfig eth0:0 down ifconfig eth0:0- 0

Remove another IP:
ifconfig eth0:1 down ifconfig eth0:1- 0
